data.title: On October 7, 1993, Toni Morrison was the first black woman to receive the Nobel Prize in Literature in ANY category! She won the award due...
data.meta_description:
16 likes, 0 comments - locd_and_lit on February 23, 2024: "On October 7, 1993, Toni Morrison was the first black woman to receive the Nobel Prize in Literature in ANY category! She won the award due to her work on The Bluest Eye, over 20 years after its publication. Toni was 62 years old! ü´∂üèΩüíï
